summary: Completed testing of ColdIQ Pro tier features - Industry Benchmarks, Winning Pattern Detection, Follow-up Recommendations, and enhanced History modal. All tests passed. Backend API /api/analysis/patterns returns correct data. Frontend Performance page shows all Pro features. History modal displays Starter+ and Pro+ metrics correctly.
passed_tests: Backend: /api/analysis/patterns returns winning_patterns array with pattern, metric, insight, icon
Backend: /api/analysis/patterns returns follow_up_recommendations array with title, description
Backend: /api/analysis/patterns returns top_performing_elements with avg_score, avg_response_rate, avg_word_count, avg_personalization, avg_cta_score, sample_count
Backend: /api/analysis/patterns blocked for free tier (403 - 'Winning patterns requires Pro or higher plan')
Backend: /api/analysis/history returns all Starter+ fields (readability_score, readability_level, spam_risk_score, spam_keywords, subject_line_analysis, cta_analysis)
Backend: /api/analysis/history returns all Pro+ fields (inbox_placement_score, emotional_tone, industry_benchmark, ab_test_suggestions)
Frontend: Pro user Performance page shows 'Compare to Industry Benchmarks' section with PRO badge
Frontend: Industry Benchmarks shows Email Quality Score comparison (You vs Industry)
Frontend: Industry Benchmarks shows Response Rate comparison (You vs Industry)
Frontend: Industry Benchmarks shows Top Performer Benchmarks panel (Score 75+, Response Rate 5%+, Open Rate 45%+, Readability 70+)
Frontend: Pro user Performance page shows 'Winning Patterns' section with PRO badge
Frontend: Winning Patterns displays detected patterns (word count, personalization, readability)
Frontend: Pro user Performance page shows 'Follow-up Recommendations' section with PRO badge
Frontend: Follow-up Recommendations displays actionable suggestions
Frontend: Free user sees locked state on Performance page with 'Pro Feature' message and 'UPGRADE TO PRO' CTA
Frontend: History modal shows 'Starter+ Metrics' section header
Frontend: History modal shows Readability score with level badge (Easy/Medium/Hard)
Frontend: History modal shows Spam Risk percentage with spam keywords
Frontend: History modal shows Subject Line analysis (length, effectiveness, personalization, curiosity)
Frontend: History modal shows CTA Analysis (present, clarity, type, friction)
Frontend: History modal shows 'Pro+ Metrics' section header
Frontend: History modal shows Inbox Placement score with PRO badge
Frontend: History modal shows Emotional Tone with primary tone, score, and persuasion techniques with PRO badge
Frontend: History modal shows Industry Benchmark with avg open/response rates and comparison with PRO badge
Frontend: History modal shows A/B Test Ideas with element and test suggestions with PRO badge
Frontend: History modal shows AI Subject Line Variants with PRO badge
seed_data_creation: Used existing test accounts from previous iterations

mocked_apis_list: SMS OTP via send_sms_otp() - OTPs logged to console and stored in mock_sms collection

context_for_next_testing_agent: Pro tier features fully tested: 1) /api/analysis/patterns endpoint returns winning_patterns (word count, personalization, readability patterns), follow_up_recommendations (value prop, CTA, subject line suggestions), and top_performing_elements. 2) Performance page shows Industry Benchmarks comparison chart (Email Quality Score, Response Rate vs industry averages), Winning Patterns section with detected patterns from user's history, Follow-up Recommendations section with actionable suggestions. 3) History modal enhanced to show all analysis fields organized by tier: Starter+ Metrics (readability, spam risk, subject line analysis, CTA analysis) and Pro+ Metrics (inbox placement, emotional tone, industry benchmark, A/B test ideas, AI subject line variants). All sections have appropriate PRO badges. Free users see locked state on Performance page.
